title: darishanam taruvAyE
sahitya:
darishanam taruvAyE SaNmukhanE


anupallavi

  karishanam illaiyO kAnmuLai en mIdE karuNaiyin kaDalenrE karudi vandEn inrE


caraNam    unranaik-kANAmal uDal shuman-en payanO umaitaru vElanE oLIvaDi vAnavA 
enranaip-parivuDan EtraruL puriyAmal irundiDal ErkkumO EzhaimEl krOdhamO
